name: The Infinity Road
description:
The Infinity Road is classic style game is inspired by classic game
In this game you control car to avoid car to not crash to get best score
What's your best score ?

Key Features:
4 game modes
2 different colors
get best score
nice art direction

INFO

Classic Mode : Control the traditional way.

Modern Mode : You can switch between the far right and far left sides easily.

Hard Classic Mode : Control the traditional way and you will reach max speed quickly.

Hard Modern Mode : Modern Control Mode + Hard Mode.
